text: But up to now there are no RCTs comparing NACT plus surgery versus primary chemoradiotherapy which is considered the standard of care for locally advanced cervical cancer all over the word.Two recently concluded phase III trials ((EORTC 55994) will hopefully delineate the impact of NACT followed by radical surgery versus chemoradiotherapy in women with LACC.
